name: Galaxy Storm: Galaxia Invader
description:
Defend Earth from the alien space invaders as they swoop and dive-bomb the defending player.

Collect bonus power-ups and use them to destroy the attacking swarm of enemies. You have 3 lives so make them count. This is One Hard Shmup!!

Free game inspired by space shooter games like Galaxian, Galaga and Space Invaders.

If you enjoy it then share it!!

Press:
★★ App Weekender Pick - AndroidTapp.com ★★
4/5 Stars – A solid, entertaining and challenging shoot 'em up, Galaxy Storm is a great homage that old and young should try out. - Androidheadlines.com

Fast Arcade Shoot'em up (Shmup) space shooter in the style of classic retro games.

Power-up with Blaster rapid fire, Plasma cannon, Side guns etc, Shields and more...

Features:
★ Easy to play, Hard to master
★ Fast smooth action on phone or tablet
★ Includes Power-ups and Bosses!
★ Great sound effects and soundtrack
★ Retro arcade feel of 1980s
★ Global Scoreboard (to get on it score over 5000+ points)
★ 3 Control modes (Buttons or 1 Finger Drag or 2 Finger Drag)
★ Score bonuses for killing charging enemies
★ Optional CRT scanlines!!
★ Responsive controls: easy for kids or adults
★ Multi-touch with fire button on top right of screen

Inspired by Galaxian and Galaga type shooter games.
